tweet: IOTA Becomes A Founding Member of New International Association of Trusted Blockchain Applications (INATBA):  https://t.co/8Ichuhy6Hy  https://t.co/L5Xi3crjbL #IOTA #INATBA
EU launches blockchain association to accelerate distributed ledger technology adoption. #IOTA is one of the Founding members and now part of the Board  https://t.co/Zof0YIeM1r via @VentureBeat

As part of the signing ceremony we've put the official (unsigned) document on the #IOTA Tangle. You can verify the document yourself here:  https://t.co/ptd6xDnv0Z The first time that such a document at the European Commission was put on various public ledgers!
IOTA at Hannover Messe 2019 on the blog now.  https://t.co/4h8PpPeFNU @eshelter_de, @i_am_pass, @eClassStandard, @Fujitsu_DE  #IOTA #HannoverMesse #HM2019

Very excited that #IOTA is one of the founding members and board member of #INATBA. The adoption of Crypto Currencies and DLT can only happen if we have the right regulatory framework, and bring stakeholders (policymakers, corporates, foundations) together to tackle key issues.

Machine-to-machine economy live in action! The car makes an automated real time micro-transactions to a parking space based on the exact parking duration.
